structure.unit: Chapter 19 RESPONSIBLE PROPERTY OWNER AND MERCHANT ACT

text.section:
Sec. 19-15.2. Compliance with this Section.
Upon verification of a violation of this section, the enforcement officer shall issue a courtesy warning notice to the property and business lessee where applicable. Failure to comply with this notice shall result in the issuance of a civil citation in accordance with. The issuance of citations for repeat offenses shall be in the manner discussed in.
